title: India Income Tax Portal Replica with Full Navigation, Calculator & Official Links

requirements.text: Create a Homepage that mirrors incometax.gov.in's design, layout, and color scheme. Include a hero banner with the official portal branding (blue/navy and saffron/orange colors, Ashoka emblem, 'Income Tax Department - Government of India' header), a marquee/ticker for news & updates, and quick-access tiles for major services (e-Filing, Tax Calculator, Forms, PAN/TAN, Refund Status).

quotes: same to same like website but in app
everything same to same and totally linked with the indian goverment income tax portal

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders with navy/blue header matching incometax.gov.in branding
Ashoka emblem and 'Income Tax Department - Government of India' text appears in header
Scrolling news & updates ticker/marquee is visible
Quick-access service tiles for e-Filing, Tax Calculator, Forms, PAN/TAN, Refund Status are displayed
Footer with disclaimer and government attribution is present

requirements.text: Build a top navigation bar matching the official incometax.gov.in structure with dropdown menus for: Home, About Us, e-Filing (ITR Filing, View Filed Returns, Upload Form 16), Tax Services (Tax Calculator, Form 26AS, AIS), Forms (ITR-1 through ITR-7, Form 15G/15H), Downloads, Help & FAQ. All items that require official login must open the corresponding URL on incometax.gov.in in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar has all major sections matching incometax.gov.in
Dropdown menus open on hover/click for each section
Each action link opens the correct incometax.gov.in URL in a new tab
Navigation is responsive and collapses to a hamburger menu on mobile

requirements.text: Build a Tax Calculator page supporting both Old Regime and New Regime for FY 2024-25 (AY 2025-26). Include inputs for annual income, age group (below 60, 60-80, above 80), deductions under 80C/80D/80TTA/HRA (Old Regime only), and display a detailed tax breakdown (gross income, deductions, taxable income, tax slabs, surcharge, health & education cess at 4%, and net tax payable). Show a side-by-side comparison of both regimes.

quotes: Tax Calculator (Old vs New Regime FY 2024-25)

acceptanceCriteria: User can select Old Regime or New Regime or view both
Tax is computed correctly using FY 2024-25 slabs for both regimes
Age group affects basic exemption limit (2.5L / 3L / 5L for Old Regime)
New Regime uses updated slabs: 0-3L nil, 3-7L 5%, 7-10L 10%, 10-12L 15%, 12-15L 20%, above 15L 30%
Standard deduction of ₹75,000 applied for New Regime
4% cess applied on total tax
Surcharge applied correctly for incomes above ₹50L
Side-by-side comparison of tax liability under both regimes is displayed
Rebate under Section 87A applied where applicable

requirements.text: Create an ITR Forms Directory page listing all ITR forms (ITR-1 Sahaj, ITR-2, ITR-3, ITR-4 Sugam, ITR-5, ITR-6, ITR-7) with a brief description of who should use each form and direct download/view links pointing to the official incometax.gov.in forms page.

quotes: ITR forms directory with links to official forms

acceptanceCriteria: All 7 ITR forms are listed with name and applicability description
Download/View button for each form links to the official government portal URL
Links open in a new tab

requirements.text: Create a PAN/TAN Services section page listing PAN-related services: Apply for New PAN (links to NSDL/UTI portal), Apply for Changes/Correction in PAN, Link PAN with Aadhaar, PAN Verification, Apply for TAN, TAN Verification. Each service card must have a description and a button linking to the respective official government URL (incometax.gov.in, onlineservices.nsdl.com, or tin.tin.nsdl.com as appropriate).

quotes: PAN/TAN services section linked to official portal

acceptanceCriteria: All listed PAN/TAN services are shown as cards or a list
Each service links to the correct official government URL in a new tab
Link PAN-Aadhaar card includes the official incometax.gov.in link

requirements.text: Create a Refund Status page that shows instructions on how to check income tax refund status, and includes a prominent button/link directing users to the official NSDL refund status portal (tin.tin.nsdl.com/oltas/refundstatuslogin.html) and the incometax.gov.in e-Filing portal. Display informational steps: how long refunds take, common reasons for delay, and helpline numbers.

quotes: Refund status info section redirecting to official portal

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays step-by-step instructions for checking refund status
Button links to official NSDL refund status portal and/or incometax.gov.in
Links open in a new tab
Helpline number (1800 103 0025 / 1800 419 0025) is displayed

requirements.text: Add a News & Updates section (also appearing as a ticker on the homepage) that displays recent announcements relevant to income tax, such as filing deadlines, new circulars, and regime changes for FY 2024-25. Content should be static but realistic, mirroring the style of the official portal's updates feed. Include a 'View All' link pointing to https://www.incometax.gov.in/iec/foportal/.
acceptanceCriteria: A scrolling ticker on the homepage shows recent news items
A full News & Updates page lists multiple announcements with dates
'View All' link redirects to incometax.gov.in

requirements.text: Add a prominent 'Login to e-Filing Portal' button on the homepage and in the navigation that redirects users to https://eportal.incometax.gov.in/iec/foservicesapp/#/login in a new tab. Also add a 'Register' link redirecting to https://eportal.incometax.gov.in/iec/foservicesapp/#/register. The existing internal login/register pages can be retained for the app's own user management but the primary CTA should clearly link to the official portal.

quotes: All action buttons/links redirect to actual incometax.gov.in pages

acceptanceCriteria: Prominent 'Login to e-Filing Portal' button is visible on homepage and in nav
Button opens https://eportal.incometax.gov.in in a new tab
'Register on Portal' link is also present linking to official registration URL
A disclaimer note is shown near these buttons explaining the user will be redirected to the official government portal

requirements.text: Update the TanStack Router routes to include the new pages: /home (or update / to serve as the portal homepage), /tax-calculator, /itr-forms, /pan-tan-services, /refund-status, /news-updates. Ensure the PortalLayout wraps all pages and navigation links work correctly between internal pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All new routes are accessible via URL
Navigation links correctly route between internal pages
PortalLayout header and footer appear on all pages
No 404 errors for any listed route

requirements.text: Add a disclaimer banner/strip visible on every page stating: 'This is an informational companion app. For official tax filing and government services, visit incometax.gov.in.' with a clickable link. Style it in a government-notice style (amber/yellow background with dark text).
acceptanceCriteria: Disclaimer strip is visible on every page
Text includes a clickable link to incometax.gov.in
Styled with amber/yellow background to clearly denote it as a notice

constraints: All external links to government services must open in a new tab (target='_blank' with rel='noopener noreferrer')
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Use official Indian Income Tax portal color scheme: navy blue (#003366 / #1a3a6b) and saffron/orange (#FF6600 / #f47820), matching incometax.gov.in
Backend data model changes should be minimal — the app is primarily a frontend replica with external links
nonGoals: Actual integration with government APIs or real-time data from incometax.gov.in
Real tax filing functionality — all filing actions redirect to the official portal
Real PAN verification or Aadhaar linking — only redirect to official services
User authentication via Internet Identity for this replica feature set
Fetching live news or updates from government servers

required: Ashoka Chakra / Government of India emblem circular seal icon in navy blue and gold (ashoka-emblem.dim_128x128.png)
Income Tax Department India header banner background with subtle watermark pattern in navy blue (itd-header-banner.dim_1200x80.png)
Indian flag color strip banner — saffron, white, green horizontal stripes (flag-strip.dim_800x24.png)
